phrases: I wonder if I will get to see the fall next year.
The sun is the light for the early sleepers.
The moon and stars are light for the night owls.
Complete all the rituals by night.
Hey, beloved child of the night.
Do you think you will be done preparing for Yule?
We are preparing for Yule soon.
You sleepy-head, the night will be here before you know it.
Set the Yule Log ablaze in your hearth...
Before the Horned God and his Dark Lady walk the earth.
I call them the Yule twins because they always come on the day of the winter solstice,
but I do not really know their names.
We are going to be busy today.
You have to tell me if you get tired.
I will tell you, I promise.
I am a failure of a familiar.
I cannot help Chise when she is in trouble.
He is been like this ever since that day.
You understand Chise far better than I do, do not you?
It may be tough for you to say anything because Chise tends to hide things,
but you can tell me sooner.
I will take care of it.
She is a bit cold right now.
It is because we just came inside.
They say that traditionally, it is okay to kiss under the mistletoe.
He looks like he wants to.
All right, let us have dinner.
Okay, sir, I will be sure to deliver this.
Sorry it is always so last-minute.
It is no problem at all.
It will be okay, I left a note.
Sorry to drag you all the way out to London.
You really do not know what to get for him?
What did you get him before?
He was the one giving me gifts, so I thought this year, I would get him something.
Are not you getting that bonehead anything?
I would never even thought about it.
Let us go look for a present together, then.
She is not giving me a choice, is she?
There is the question of taste, too.
I do not even know what his tastes are.
I have never given anyone a gift before.
I do not... well, I do not know too many people.
I do not know anyone like that, either.
We are in the same boat, then.
You are a mage and I am a sorcerer,
but we both live our lives studying with our masters.
So we are in the same boat.
Hey, it is the lady from Mr. Ainsworth's place.
Who are you talking to, Chise?
Unlike mages, sorcerers do not notice people like us, who have disguised ourselves.
Nice to meet you, my lady.
What about something that you can picture them using?
Want to take another lap around?
Something he uses all the time, huh?
I think I have an idea.
Let us hang out, like old times.
I am not doing drugs anymore.
They are just stragglers from my past.
I did not start by choice, either.
It is still like a dream.
This is not fun to talk about.
My shitty parents got me into drugs.
I had nothing going for me outside of selling that crap, when Master took me in.
Hey, have you seen the blonde brat?
We need to teach her a lesson.
What the hell are you looking at?
Do you want to stay here forever?
I have not introduced myself yet.
I did not trust him in the slightest at the time.
Before that, I would grown up in a trash pit.
There was no way I could trust people.
I told you not to open them!
No, that was my fault, too.
I should have told you more clearly.
You should not be getting yourself hurt again.
I am used to treating wounds.
I will protect you, as your bodyguard.
I am counting on you next time.
Thinking about that makes me feel like shit.
I do not know what to say.
You do not need to think anything about it.
I will decide for myself whether I am happy or miserable.
All right, let us get back.
Oh yeah, is my servant bird at your place?
I will write you a letter again.
Thanks for coming out at the last minute.
I hope it works out for both of us.
As my big brother, do you approve?
She is not a bad person.
What did you want all the way out in London?
And you even met with Renfred's apprentice.
Do you know how many times you have put yourself in danger?
You cannot sneak out like that.
I thought you would say no.
Do not be too angry, Elias.
I know it is a day early, but...
I did not think you would get me anything.
I did not think I would get you anything.
You are always wearing the same one, so I thought maybe it relaxes you.
I-If you do not like it...
I have only made them for Angelica and her family.
I thought I would make one for you, too.
Angelica told me a long time ago that she wanted a teddy bear as a gift.
I think this year's is my best one yet.
You have been doing it ever since?
I do not really know what else to do.
It has a bit of a trick, too.
Those are all gifts for you.
Angelica, Simon, and Lindel have gotten you gifts, too.
Gifts are meant to be opened on Christmas Day,
All right, let us have dinner first.
I was hoping he would forgotten.
I would have gone with you.
And I could have gotten some shopping done.
I would not agree to that.
I had a secret talk with another girl about girl stuff.
Is this what Christmas is supposed to be like?
I cannot believe I am looking forward to waking up.
Siblings that are at the mercy of his eternal life.
The mage and the girl lend them a hand, but...
